Title: Backdoor introduction via registry permission change through WMI (DAMP)
Description: This technique involves attackers using Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) to change registry permissions
Remark: creating a backdoor to gain unauthorized access to a system. By altering the permissions
Severity: attackers can execute malicious code or maintain persistent access without being detected
